alert.note: Alert for Allen; Chase; Greenwood; Labette; Montgomery; Neosho; Wilson; Woodson (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 01 at 1:12PM CST until February 03 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Areas of sleet, freezing drizzle, freezing rain, and snow developing this evening, gradually transitioning to all snow from north to south overnight into Wednesday morning. Total snow accumulations through Thursday morning of 5 to 8 inches, with locally higher amounts possible. Ice accumulations up to around one- tenth of an inch across southeast Kansas. * WHERE...Portions of East-Central and Southeast Kansas. * WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to noon CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on hazardous road conditions. Gusty north winds will support blowing and drifting snow, which could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning and evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Bitter cold sub-zero wind chills will overspread the area Wednesday night.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Allen; Chase; Greenwood; Labette; Montgomery; Neosho; Wilson; Woodson
